summary: Email chain between an attorney and FBI agents coordinating logistics for victim briefings and interviews related to the Jeffrey Epstein case. The attorney discusses bringing clients, including one with extensive information about Epstein's activities, to FBI briefings in New York and Florida, and scheduling interviews with prosecutors.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the FBI victim briefings; identified as the perpetrator whose victims are being invited to the briefings.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in Florida
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein held at the Miami Field Office.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein held at the New York Field Office.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division organized briefings for victims of Jeffrey Epstein in October 2019 in both Florida and New York.
An attorney mentions a client with 'a vast amount of information' who was brought to the US multiple times by Epstein and interacted with many people.
The attorney is coordinating with the FBI to schedule interviews for clients, including one whose prior interview with prosecutors was incomplete.
The correspondence involves logistical planning for victim participation, including security clearance for attorneys attending federal building briefings.
Multiple victim names are referenced but are redacted or omitted from the provided text.
